attributes.action: compel CfBT to offer residential programmes such as offered by the former NAGTY as they operate YG&T.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the residential programme of summer schools hosted by universities were an integral and highly important part of the service offered by NAGTY when it was operational and the CfBT should be compelled to continue this excellent programme. We also believe that these Summer Schools have massively improved the lives of those who have attended them and provided further educational stimulation and lifelong friendships which we believe to be necessary for their and this country's continued success.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
